description: Sets up a AWS SQS queue

fifo.description: Whether or not this queue is a FIFO queue

content_based_deduplication.description: Whether or not to enable content based deduplication

sqs_subscribers.description: List of SQS ARNs to push from this topic.

items.description: The ARN of the SQS queue to subscribe to.

delay_seconds.description: The time in seconds that the delivery of all messages in the queue will be delayed.

message_retention_seconds.description: The number of seconds for which Amazon SQS retains a message.

receive_wait_time_seconds.description: The time for which a ReceiveMessage call will wait for a message to arrive.
